A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely awful. The movie has 'Star Wars' in the title but it is not a Star Wars movie. 'The Last Jedi' isn't a lazy re-hash like 'The Force Awakens' was but its sins are just as bad. Episode 4\, 5\, 6\, and Rogue One are the only Star Wars films that exist\, while everything else is horrible fan fiction. Good job on killing the Skywalker family and my childhood.
